Hardwell On Air（缩写为 HOA）是由荷兰 DJ 和唱片制作人 Hardwell 创建和主持的周更广播节目。自 2011 年 3 月 4 日起，该节目于每周五晚上 11:00 到 00:00 在 Hardwell 的官方 YouTube 和 Facebook 主页上开始直播。许多网站和 FM 广播电台也播放该节目。在一小时的节目中，Hardwell 表演了他的新作品。据他所说，这些曲目体现了Electro、Progressive 和 Tech-house 的特点。很长一段时间以来，他都在节目最后时表演 Hardstyle 的曲目，即使在前期时也表演了不同流派的曲目。每一集节目都可在 iTunes 上的“Podcasts”类别中免费下载。

 

该节目的最后一集第 500 集于 2021 年 1 月 15 日播出，由 Tomorrowland 的 One World Radio 的 Adam K 主持的新节目《Revealed Selected》接着播出。

 

理念

每一集节目长为一小时，并以一小段演唱开场。每一集的开场白都用一个扭曲的声音说着同样的话语：“我们在直播吗？欢迎收听你夜生活的原声带。现在和未来的一小时。欢迎收听《Hardwell on air》。 ”介绍时的配乐是 Hardwell 于 2011 年发行的歌曲《Encoded》。接着，Hardwell 会发表一段讲话，然后开始演奏歌曲。每集包含的内容如下：

  • Hardwell 独家表演：即将在 Revealed Recordings 上发行的歌曲，有时是 Hardwell 本人制作的歌曲，有时两者都有。

  • 每周曲目：一首因质量或其他因素令人信服的新歌曲。

  • 每周样本唱片：Hardwell 或厂牌收到的样本曲目。

 

后来，Community Picks 栏目的三首歌曲取代了 Demo of the Week 栏目的内容。一般厂牌收到了 Community Picks 中的歌曲，然后在子厂牌 Revealed Radar 下发布。

 

该节目展示了许多不同流派的音乐，后来其音乐风格大多改为 Hardstyle 或 Future-bass，Hardwell 也为此发表了一个声明。为了防止歌曲在发布之前被使用，Hardwell 会在许多歌曲中添加一个 shout 或者 tag 说明音乐的来源。2017 年初，网络上出现了一段视频，韩国喜剧演员兼 DJ G-Park 和 DJ Charles 正在演奏 Jewelz & Sparks 的《Grande Opera》。 在节目未播出期间以及歌曲未发行之前，大家可以听到 Hardwell 带有“Hardwell On Air”tag 的音乐，这说明两人非法录制了节目中的曲目。从那时起，两人经常在表演中带上“Hardwell On Air”的 tag 插科打诨。

 

2017 年 6 月 14 日，Jewelz & Sparks 在韩国 Ultra 音乐节上再次使用《Hardwell On Air》的样本演奏了他们的曲目《Grande Opera》，并在 Facebook 上发布了该曲目。
contentEn:
Hardwell On Air (abbreviated HOA) is the name of a weekly radio show created and hosted by Dutch DJ and record producer Hardwell. Since 4 March 2011, the program has been broadcast live on Fridays from 11:00 p.m. to 00:00 via Hardwell's official YouTube and Facebook profile. A number of Internet and FM radio stations broadcast the podcast in their program as well. During the show, he presents new productions in a one-hour set. According to his own statement the tracks embody the genres electro-, progressive- and tech-house. Since quite some time, the episodes are finished with a hardstyle track and even during the set there are several deviations from the genres. All episodes are offered as free download on iTunes in the category "Podcasts".

 

The last 500th episode was broadcast on 15 January 2021. Its follow up was a new show called Revealed Selected, hosted by Adam K of Tomorrowland's One World Radio.[1]

 

Concept

The sets have a length of one hour and are initiated with a vocal short. This consists of a distorted voice, which introduces each episode with the same word sequence: "Are we on Air? Welcome to the soundtrack of your nightlife. One hour of the present and future. Tune in, to Hardwell on air". The soundtrack of the intro consists of the song "Encoded" by Hardwell himself, released in the year 2011.[2] A follow-up statement from Hardwell can be heard. Usually follows this one or more smoother songs. The following categories are processed in each episode:

  • Hardwell Exclusive: One or more songs that will be released on "Revealed Recordings" and / or were produced by Hardwell himself.
  • Track of the Week: A newly released song, which convinces by high quality and / or other factors.
  • Demo of the Week: A demotrack that was sent to Hardwell or the label.

 

Demo of the Week was then replaced with three Community Picks which are tracks sent to the label and then released under the sub-label Revealed Radar.

 

After the different categories have been dealt with, the music style is mostly changed to hardstyle or future-bass, whereupon the episode experiences a back-announcement by Hardwell. For many songs, a shout or tag is added, which refers to the podcast, to protect the song from being used before the release is done. Regarding to this, in early 2017 a video came to the Internet, which shows Korean comedian and DJ G-Park and DJ Charles playing Jewelz & Sparks's "Grande Opera". During the break Hardwell can be heard presenting the track as well as the "Hardwell On Air tag" just before the drop starts. This indicated that the duo recorded the track from the podcast and did not get it legally.[3] As a running gag, the duo played the track in combination with the "Hardwell On Air tag" since then.

 

On June 14, 2017 Jewelz & Sparks playing their track "Grande Opera" with Hardwell On Air sample again in Ultra Music Festival Korea, also posted in Facebook.

 

References

  1. ^ "RadioPush: Revealed Selected". RadioPush. Retrieved 2021-02-18.
  2. ^ "Hardwell On Air intro". YouTube
  3. ^ Matthew Meadow: "A Pair of Asian DJs Dropped Hardwell's “Hardwell On Air” in Their Set". Your EDM
